meta_title: What is an Asset? Industrial Asset Definition & Overview
meta_description: Define assets within industrial maintenance and manufacturing. Understand physical asset value, lifecycle management, and operational reliability for 2026.
title: Definition of Assets

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Definition of Assets

image_prompt: A high-tech, photorealistic industrial setting showing a clean, modern factory floor. In the foreground, a diverse group of maintenance engineers in professional PPE (hard hats, high-visibility vests) are looking at a tablet that displays a digital twin or 3D schematic of a large, complex robotic assembly arm. The lighting is bright and professional, highlighting the scale and sophistication of the industrial machinery.
